titles: I write code in JS and C++
about: Hello. As written above, my name is Dima. I have been working professionally as a programmer since 2018. I have developed cross-platform mobile applications in Qt, but I discovered JS in 2020 and fell in love with it. I love developing the backend part and everything that connected with it. I have experience in developing microservices, building CI/CD using GitLab and working with cloud providers (GCP).

education.title: Voronezh State Technical University Specialist
education.speciality: Department of Radioelectronic Control Systems and Complexes

experience.duties: Development of new and support for old cross-platform mobile applications on Qt (using Object-C and Java). Designing and creating an API in Yii2.
Refinement of a mobile application on Qt.

skills.name: GIT
skills.description: I can work from the console

tech_stack: Linux, Docker, k8s, Helm, CI/CD, GitLab, DevOps, GitOps
achievements: Implemented monitoring and logging in the backend part
Introduced various Firebase services into a Qt mobile application
I know how to work with JNI in Qt
